directions: Combine cauliflower, bell pepper, carrot, onion, celery, olives, parsley, salt, and pepper in a large bowl.
Whisk vinegar, olive oil, garlic, dill, and crushed pepper flakes together in a small bowl until smooth. Pour dressing over the cauliflower mixture. Stir until evenly combined.
Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving.
ingredients: ⅓ cup pimento-stuffed green olives, cut in half
salt and ground black pepper to taste
½ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes
title: Spicy Marinated Cauliflower Salad | Allrecipes
